atk-s0103a0:8_3: and he ends the benefit of suffering.
atk-s0103a0:8_4: They go on loyal to buttermilk ...
atk-s0103a0:8_5: However, when I taught the Dhamma for the complete ending of suffering, what exactly did I performed a superhuman demonstration of psychic power?
atk-s0103a0:8_6: Have been done in me, and it seems to me that they haven’t attained the deathless, the lord of gods, the Thirty-Three, and the surface of the deathless. And I won’t consent to extinguishment. Yet I’m debates, for them to remove the second point.
atk-s0103a0:9_0: she disclosed what is known as the world.
atk-s0103a0:9_1: ‘This is the peak of the world.’
atk-s0103a0:9_2: Here it in order to speak to a person.
